sentence: The main attractions on Saturday were Rep. Liz Cheney, the Wyoming Republican and fierce Trump critic recently removed from GOP House leadership, and Brad Raffensperger, the Republican secretary of state of Georgia who rebuffed Trump's claims of widespread voter fraud.
title: A MAGA gala, a far-right rally, and a plea for Jan. 6 justice: Trio of summits tests GOP's future

sentence: Former President Donald Trump will address his supporters at an annual meeting of conservative activists in Orlando, Florida, while his Republican critics will hear from the congresswoman he's hellbent on defeating Rep. Liz Cheney, R-Wyo.
title: With Liz Cheney's re-election prospects in doubt, her national profile grows

sentence: While Liz Cheney was cavorting with Never Trump sissies and squeezing donors, her opponent Harriet Hageman was at CPAC and word is that the Beltway Cowgirl is doomed.
author: Kurt Schlichter
title: The Big News Out of CPAC 2022 Is That Trump Is Back

sentence: Wyoming Rep. Liz Cheney was kicked out of her role as conference chair just weeks after last year's retreat in Orlando.
author: Chris Marquette
title: House GOP heads to Florida to narrow in on policy plans

sentence: A leader with honor would be rejecting not protecting the pro-Putin, anti-Semitic, white nationalist members of the party, instead of fighting against Liz Cheney for telling the truth,? Cheney campaign spokesman Jeremy Adler said Thursday.
author: Kerry Picket
title: Cheney spokesman says GOP lawmakers support Putin for endorsing her primary opponent

sentence: Amodei along with about 100 other Republicans endorsed and co-hosted a fundraiser for Harriet Hageman, who is running against Rep. Liz Cheney, R-Wyo., a member of the House committee investigating Jan. 6 and a fierce Trump critic.
author: Steve Sebelius
title: PARTY LINES: Mayoral term limits, again?
